about_the_game:
It's only a Fun Project, that's the reason there are only subtitles



Stockwrk7 is a small (and short(!)) first person adventure game with horror elements and puzzles that the player has to solve in order to escape the 7th floor.

Game Features of Stockwrk7

  • Over 130 voicelines for a harmonious atmosphere.
  • Over twenty different Interactive Objects.
  • Areas worked out with love with high-resolution 3D models.
  • Combining objects and find clues to solve the cryptic puzzles.

About the project Stockwrk7


The aim of this project was to learn new things. The idea itself of building a (small) horror adventure game came up in a stream in the summer of 2022 and since I would be lost without deadlines, the goal was Halloween 2022.
Due to the lack of time (always after work), no A/AA title should be expected.
You can follow the work on the project or on new projects on Twitch -> GudeAndi .

It's only a Fun Project, that's the Reason there isn't a translation.

The assets are primarily sourced from Quixel/EpidemicSound/Epic Marketplace.

Supporters

The voice output is by cOrnY.

Various 3D models from Derabo1.

name: Stockwrk7

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-6700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or AMD equivalent (min. 6GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-9500k or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX Card for DLSS
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

short_description: A short FREE First Person Horror-Adventure on a single Floor. Explore the Floor and try to solve the riddles. But don't get too deep into it. You don't know what you'll find. There are only englisch subtitles. Sorry.
supported_languages:
German*, English
*languages with full audio support
